0111110101101011 1010111110000001 0 -> sum: 0010110011101100, cout: 1

0100101001001000 0110001000110100 1 -> sum: 1010110001111101, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
